name: Life is a Routine
description:
*May need to lower volume for headset users.

Use arrow keys to navigate through each area and bump into objects and characters to interact.

I wanted to share how mundane life can get, especially during times in our life that are on repeat. The end is my imagination of the future. 

More than anything, I hope this game gave you a hint of encouragement. Thank you for playing!

Made using Adam Le Doux's Bitsy Game Maker and AYolland's Borksy Game Hacker.
